faqs.question: Kunnen buitenlanders eigendom kopen in Spanje?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. Non-residents can buy as easily as Spanish citizens. You'll need an NIE (Spanish tax identification number), a Spanish bank account, and should engage Spanish legal counsel familiar with international property transactions. Most Costa Blanca estate agents routinely facilitate foreign purchases with English-language support.

faqs.question: Wat zijn de kosten om eigendom te kopen in Spanje?
faqs.answer: Beyond purchase price, expect approximately 7-10% additional costs including: 6% property transfer tax, 1-1.5% registry fees, 0.4-1% notary fees, and legal fees (€800-1,500). Mortgage fees apply if financing. Annual ownership costs include 0.4-1.1% property tax and minimal community fees for villas. These costs are competitive versus UK property transactions.

faqs.question: Kan ik als buitenlander een hypotheek krijgen in Spanje?
faqs.answer: Yes, major Spanish banks and mortgage specialists regularly finance foreign property purchases. Typical requirements include proof of income, credit history, and 30-40% deposit. Interest rates remain competitive (currently 3-4%). Specialist lenders familiar with UK and Northern European buyers streamline cross-border lending processes. Pre-approval typically takes 2-4 weeks.

faqs.question: Wat zijn de kosten van levensonderhoud aan de Costa Blanca?
faqs.answer: Cost of living in Alfas del Pi runs significantly lower than UK/Northern Europe. Utilities average €80-120 monthly, groceries cost 20-30% less than UK equivalents, and restaurant meals average €10-15. Healthcare through the Spanish system remains affordable. Overall, comfortable living costs approximately 30-40% less than comparable UK coastal communities, making holiday home ownership economically sustainable.

faqs.question: Hoe is het weer aan de Costa Blanca?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca enjoys Mediterranean climate with 300+ annual sunshine days. Summers (June-September) reach 28-30°C with minimal rainfall. Winters (December-February) average 12-16°C with occasional rain. Spring (March-May) and autumn (September-November) provide perfect conditions: 20-25°C with 7-10 sunshine hours daily. Sea temperatures range 14°C (winter) to 27°C (summer), suitable for swimming most of the year.

faqs.question: Hoe ver is de Costa Blanca van België?
faqs.answer: Alicante Airport (28km from this property) offers direct flights to London (Gatwick, Stansted, Luton) with flight times of 2 hours 15 minutes. Budget carriers like Ryanair and easyJet provide frequent daily services with fares often €30-60 return. Weekend travel from UK to holiday home takes approximately 6-7 hours door-to-door, making extended weekend escapes practical and economical.
